price: 168. Als wij een herinnering hadden gehad zoals de eerdere generaties.
arabic: لَوۡ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكۡرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: law anna ʿindanā dhik'ran mina al-awalīna
